title: BRIEF-Central Petroleum Estimates Aggregate Prospective Oil In Amadeus Basin Permit 24 Mln Barrels

BRIEF-Central Petroleum Estimates Aggregate Prospective Oil In Amadeus Basin Permit 24 Mln Barrels

Stock Markets 48 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 12:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Central Petroleum Estimates Aggregate Prospective Oil In Amadeus Basin Permit 24 Mln Barrels Oct 11 (Reuters) - Central Petroleum Ltd : * ESTIMATED AGGREGATE PROSPECTIVE GAS CONTAINED IN CO'S AMADEUS BASIN PERMITS 321 PETAJOULES * BEST ESTIMATE OF AGGREGATE PROSPECTIVE OIL IN AMADEUS BASIN TENEMENTS 24 MILLION BARRELS
